name: What If Bitcoin?
author: TechUptodate

sections.description:
What If Bitcoin? The plugin helps you to Check how much you could have made by investing in Bitcoin.

If you’re someone who has held Bitcoin for many years this could be very helpful. For the rest of us, it just reminds how much we regret not buying Bitcoin 5 years ago!

Cryptocurrency is booming in the market and if you want to attract your readers then this plugin will surely help you to get traffics.

Live Demo

  • Demo – Bitcoin ROI Calculator

Just 3 steps and your website will have Bitcoin ROI Calculator:

  • Step 1: Install and Activate the Plugin
  • Step 2: Configure look and feel of the plugin with Live Preview
  • Step 3: Just Paste the Shortcode [what-if-bitcoin] where you want to Display … that’s it.

Features:

  • Calculate Bitcoin value in 3 currency: USD, GBP, EUR
  • Full control over look and feel, easy to customize
  • Responsive Layout
  • Live Preview while making changes
  • No Page reload
  • Shortcode [what-if-bitcoin] can be used anywhere in the website

Future Roadmap:

  • More Cryptocurrency options…
  • Share Feature after getting the result
  • More Currency added other than USD, GBP, EUR
  • You can request the features here

Note: This plugin is using API from https://www.coindesk.com/api/
sections.installation:
1. Install what-if-bitcoin via the plugin directory or Upload the entire what-if-bitcoin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find ‘What If Bitcoin?’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  4. Then set your required plugin setting
  5. Just copy paste this shortcode [what-if-bitcoin] to any page or in the widget.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the plugin web site.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with the plugin?

Use these support channels appropriately or Contact us here

upgrade_notice: click on update now link below plugin name then it will automatically update all plugin files.
